Notes.Text:
This update for curl fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-0500: Fix a SMTP send heap buffer overflow (bsc#1099793).
Notes.Title: Details

SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15

Vulnerabilities.Description: Curl_smtp_escape_eob in lib/smtp.c in curl 7.54.1 to and including curl 7.60.0 has a heap-based buffer overflow that might be exploitable by an attacker who can control the data that curl transmits over SMTP with certain settings (i.e., use of a nonstandard --limit-rate argument or CURLOPT_BUFFERSIZE value).
